modName: CoT Winter Edition Compatibility Patch for Texture Replacers
summary: Do you use CoT Winter Edition and another texture pack? Does your dirt look brown? Then this patch is for you!
descriptionHtml:
This mod simply contains 6 loose texture files from CoT Winter Edition\'s BSA, which you can use to overwrite any texture replacers you are using.

NMM/BAIN users: This mod must be loaded after whatever texture pack you\'re using.

Manual install: Drag it into your Skyrim directory AFTER whatever texture pack you\'re using.

Required files: CoT & CoT: Winter Edition http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17802

Thanks to jjc71
author: gutlessVADER
